option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
#!/bin/bash
SERVICE_NAME=$1
if [ -z "$SERVICE_NAME" ]; then echo "Usage: $0 <service-name>" exit 1 fi
BASE_DIR="src/main/java/com/banking/$SERVICE_NAME"
mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/controller" mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/service" mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/repository" mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/model" mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/dto" mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/config" mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/exception" mkdir -p "$BASE_DIR/util"
echo "Created structure for service: $SERVICE_NAME"
